Mio Alter

Hello! I am software engineer based in NYC.

For the past 4 years I've have worked in mostly Scala on data engineering, machine learning, and machine learning infrastructure, including on Rainier, a Scala library for Bayesian inference.

Before that, I worked on machine learning, mostly in Python. Prior to moving into industry, I received a PhD in Math from UT-Austin and, some time before that, worked at the infamous Kim's Video.
